Olave hasn’t

seen the run.

Schuler hasn’t

covered the

long throw.

Schuler’s hoping

for any touch at all.

His touch takes the

ball right into the path.

of Aristeguieta

 

Olave’s too late

to close off the

attacker.

Rimando’s forced

to leave space

at the far post.

Schuler’s touch takes the ball

into the path of Aristeguieta

Olave hasn’t

seen the run.

Schuler hasn’t

covered the

long throw.

Schuler takes a

poor touch as

he tries to clear.

Olave arrives too late to make

a difference. Rimando is forced

to leave too much space.

Schuler’s touch takes

the ball into the path

of Aristeguieta

Olave hasn’t

seen the run.

Schuler hasn’t

covered the

long throw.

Olave arrives too late

to make a difference.
